column3: Ek Din Sapne Mein Dekha Sapna
column4:
['Ek din sapne mein dekha sapna, kya', '
Arre woh jo hai naa amitabh apna, bachchan haan', '
Market se out huwa logon ko daout huwa', '
Meree vajah se woh gaya gaya gaya gaya', '
Kismat toh badalee kya kahu really', '
Mai amitabh ho gaya', '
Ho sapne mein dekha sapna', 'Ti di di di ey hee hee', '
Tu du du du o hu hu hu', '
Ti di di di ey hee hee', 'Daye mein hema malini baye pe jeenat aman', '
Samne rekha pichhe jo dekha', '
Daye mein hema baye pe jeenat', '
Samne rekha pichhe jo dekha toh kya huwa', '
Ratna khadee thee hath me chhadee thee', '
Dekhte dekhte mai bhag raha tha', '
Dekha main jag raha tha', '
Ho sapne mein dekha sapna haan', 'Haan ek aur yad aaya sunao', '
Ek din sapne mein dekha sapna', '
Arre woh jo hai naa mistar pele apna, cosmos', '
Kehte khiladee hai bada anaree hai', '
Mere sath match ho gaya gaya gaya gaya gaya', '
Arre mara jo chhakka toh catch ho gaya', '
Football me cricket', '
Ha kaha naa sapne mein dekha sapna', '
Ho sapne mein dekha sapna', 'Aur ek', '
Ek din chhotee see dekhee sapnee, sapnee', '
Woh jo hai naa lata apnee', '
Lata ga rahee thee main table pe tha', '
Woh mukhde pe thee main antare pe tha', '
Tal kahan sum kahan tum kahan ham kahan', '
Tal kahan sum kahan tum kahan ham kahan', '
Tirkit dhum nargad dhum', '
Tirkit dhum nargad dhum tum ham tum', '
Lataphat pataphat narakat karamat', '
Ta thai thai ta ta thai thai ta', '
Thaiya thaiya thai', '
Takat dhum takat dhum takat dhnya', 'Sapne mein dekha sapna,', '
Ho sapne mein dekha sapna haan.']
